long_description: The women's Transpack Compact Pro boot pack provides an easy and lightweight way to transport your boots, helmet and more to the slopes. Boot pockets on the sides feature grommets for breathability and drainage. Water-resistant center compartment helps keep gear dry; internal zippered pocket is perfect for small personal essentials. Closed-cell padded back features an ID holder; sternum strap offers stability. Fleece- and mesh-lined pocket inside the top lid is perfect for goggles. The Transpack Compact Pro boot pack features coated ballistic nylon material and tarpaulin bottom for tough water resistance.
short_description: The women's Transpack Compact Pro boot pack provides an easy and lightweight way to transport your boots, helmet and more to the slopes.
